title: Post-Hearing Analysis with Andrea Mitchell and Katy Tur (Hearing #6, 6/28/22)
description: Andrea Mitchell and Katy Tur along with a range of expert guests review the highlights of the sixth hearing presenting the findings of the investigation by the January 6th Committee.
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
